meanings.definition: A member of a nomadic Arab tribe.
meanings.sent1: The bedouins traveled across the desert with their camels.
meanings.sent2: The bedouins set up their tents in the vast desert.
meanings.sent3: The bedouins joked about getting lost in the sand dunes.
meanings.sent4: The bedouins were like wandering stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bedouins riding through the desert stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of nomadic Arab tribes.
meanings.sent1: The vast desert was home to many bedouins.
meanings.sent2: The bedouins gathered for a traditional feast under the stars.
meanings.sent3: The bedouins organized a friendly race across the dunes.
meanings.sent4: The bedouins were a moving tapestry of colors in the desert.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed through the camp of bedouins.
